headline: Fiserv acquires Dutch payment company CCV
summary: The processor will use CCV to expand the presence of its Clover point-of-sale system across Europe, the company said. The price paid was about $220 million, according to a regulatory disclosure.

raw.headline: Fiserv acquires Dutch payment company CCV
raw.summary: The processor will use CCV to expand the presence of its Clover point-of-sale system across Europe, the company said. The price paid was about $220 million, according to a regulatory disclosure.

headline: Fiserv, PayPal and FIS change up board members
summary: Payments companies are adding board members, and bidding farewell to others, as the industry sees increased merger and acquisition activity.

raw.headline: Fiserv, PayPal and FIS change up board members
raw.summary: Payments companies are adding board members, and bidding farewell to others, as the industry sees increased merger and acquisition activity.

headline: Fiserv Acquires CCV
summary: MILWAUKEE & ARNHEM, The Netherlands, March 19, 2025--Fiserv acquires CCV, a payment solutions provider in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany.

raw.headline: Fiserv Acquires CCV
